Text: Used to watch this religiously when I was a kid back in the seventies, havn't seen it since. Not HD but the quality and photography is excellent. Unlike many other shows from this time that get uploaded this one nicely fills the screen. The idea for the series reportedly came from Bruce Lee who had planned to play Caine but Hollywood nicked his idea and stuck David Carradine in the lead role, or so the story goes. This has the pilot episode and a making of documentary. Thanks spotted jackal keep 'em comin'! :-)
most grateful, saw this series as a kid and got hooked. taken a few days to d/l and quality is great, easy to think its a dvd not a dvd-r
Thank You for this one, Friend
